item.title: Promise Mascot Agency demo for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/promise-mascot-agency-demo-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc-now-available

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

An 80-minute trial of the "open-world mascot management crime drama."

An 80-minute demo for “open-world mascot management crime drama” Promise Mascot Agency is now available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, developer Kaizen Game Works announced.

“Promise Mascot Agency rocks ass,” game director Oli Clarke Smith said in a press release. “You should try the demo. I love this gang of criminals, freaks and misfits, and I think you will too.”

Here is an overview of the demo, via Kaizen Game Works:

Welcome to Promise Mascot Agency! ​ If you have a job that needs doing, we have the mascots for you! ​In this open-world genre-bending creature collector RPG, be the boss, turn a profit, and collect the most chaotic roster of bizarre and sentient mascots!

Severed pinkies! Sobbing tofu! A very innocent cat! ​Mascots of every variety are waiting to be put on your books. ​Recruit them to your agency, assign them jobs, and send them out to help the good (and not so good) people of Kaso-Machi! ​But sending your mascots out to work is never as easy as it sounds: navigate kitchen infernos, major catastrophes and the occasional breakdown with the support of your Hero Cards to ensure every job goes off without a hitch. ​
Listen to the dulcet tones of Takaya Kuroda (Yakuza: Like a Dragon) as ex-yakuza Michi, Ayano Shibuya (The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom) as chaos goblin Pinky☆, and introducing Nobuyuki Hiyama (The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time, The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask) as Captain Sign! ​All this and more in the new 80 minute-long demo.

Promise Mascot Agency is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in 2025.
